FuncDef:
The nat statistics payload enable command enables NAT payload statistics.
The undo nat statistics payload enable command disables NAT payload statistics.
By default, NAT payload statistics are disabled.
CLIs: undo nat statistics payload slot <slot-id> enable

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of a service board.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view the average and maximum payload statistics of a service board in inbound and outbound directions, run the nat statistics payload enable command to enable payload statistics. This function allows the system to collect NAT statistics every 10 minutes. You can run the display nat statistics playload command to view NAT payload statistics. If you run the nat statistics payload enable command for the first time, you need to wait for at least 20 minutes before querying the collected NAT payload statistics.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
This command is applicable only to the VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E.
